2+1.sig_info: Hulk is angered by receiving damage, strengthening his attacks by up to 34 to 166.8 based on lost Health. You wouldn't like him when he's angry!

WHEN ATTACKED & WHEN ATTACKING: 12% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6 seconds, granting +34 Attack.
PASSIVE: As Health is lost, the chance to trigger Fury effects increases by up to 50%.
When dropping below 25% Health, Hulk gets ready to smash his opponent into the ground, gaining a massive Fury for 8 seconds which increases his Attack by 93.5.
An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 85% chance to Stun the opponent for 2 seconds. The duration of the Stun increases by 1 second(s) for each Fury Buff effect the Champion has.
